website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few minor issues, these stockings are an attractive, fun, and affordable way to line your mantel in anticipation of Christmas morning.
pros: Stands out for their knitted construction that's a throwback to old-fashioned Christmas stockings
The stretchy material is ideal for stuffing with numerous small items
cons: The material is prone to snags
Random designs means you may get 2 of the same style

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Super quality. Large beautiful vibrant knitted stockings. I stuffed them full with some heavy items. Stretched an inch or two when filled, but once emptied, they bounced right back. Looked beautiful,; perfect shades of Christmas greens and red.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, but I only received one stocking. Amazon refunded me, but just unfortunate. UPDATE...I ordered them again with my Amazon credit, and STILL only received one. Stocking. It isn't even the other one from the picture, it's the same on I already received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really liked these stockings but I was expecting to get one ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these stockings but I was expecting to get one of each design, as the photo shows. The stockings came as a set of two with same design. I plan on keeping them anyway and not returning them, but I was hoping to have one of each design. They are a bit more narrow than I had expected, so they will only be able to be filled with very small gifts. BUT they seem to be good quality and I'm pretty happy with them, regardless.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: these are a fantastic bargain. But even at $30
customer_reviews.text: First, I did receive one of each pattern, exactly as shown -- so perhaps the issue that earlier reviewers had has been resolved. I purchased these on Amazon for under $15, though I see the price has now increased. For the price I paid, these are a fantastic bargain. But even at $30, they could be a worthy purchase. The colors are perfect -- rich red and pine green -- with traditional patterning. They look great hung up, and they have plenty of room for toys, candy, etc. If folk-classic is the look you're going for, these will do nicely.
customer_reviews.author: candlewriter

customer_reviews.title: Not good for young kids - toys get caught inside.
customer_reviews.text: These look adorable, are knit, and were exactly what I ordered. However, because they are knit, there are tons of strings running across the inside of the stockings. This probably doesn't matter much if you are using it for adult or all your items are packaged/wrapped. However, for a 3 and 5 year old who had a bunch of little toys with arms, legs, wheels, etc,. this made it impossible to get the toys out without adult help on Christmas morning. And clearly one of the best things about getting gifts in your stocking is being able to reach in and pull it out. Not recommended for young children.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E.

customer_reviews.title: Says "Set of 2", only received 1
customer_reviews.text: The item is listed as a set of 2 but I only received one. It's really sad because the one stocking I got was really cute and perfect, I just really wish I had received the 2 as it is listed. I wouldn't recommend this product. The title is incorrect.
customer_reviews.author: Elliotte Webb

customer_reviews.title: Only received one stocking
customer_reviews.text: I only received one stocking. So I started a return and ordered another set only to find out the price had gone up. It seems to be an issue that a few people have had and they need to figure out how to keep this from happening.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Missing One....
customer_reviews.text: Great quality ! And great size! BUT I ONLY RECEIVED ONE STOCKING FROM THE SET!!! With it being so close to Christmas, I hope they can send the other!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love these stockings, and have bought them several times as our family has grown. I love that they are cozy and traditional Christmas stockings that can also be personalized by adding a liner and stitching names into the top. Makes them look very homemade with very little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Nak

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect! The colors are deeper than what appeared online which was a plus for me. The green being closer to a hunter green and the red closer to a deep cherry red... low price, rich deep color and good thick material. I thought I was just buying something to get me through this season until I found something better and now after seeing them in person these are exactly what I wanted. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erika W

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: They look nice but every time you put your hand inside your fingers get caught in the incomplete seams. When I look inside they look like they're coming apart. $3 a stocking is cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! Other reviews said they only got one style of stocking in their two pack but I got two different kinds in my two pack. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Given the deal, I was worried these would be small or flimsy. The quality is incredible. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully stitched and both the same size and length
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully stitched and both the same size and length. Plenty of width for stuffers, especially in the foot, where other stockings seem to get things "stuck". I actually bought THREE pair and hung them on a stocking rail. The two are the SAME pattern, though, not two different patterns as the picture shows. I was fine with that. The colors are true to picture. Delivered in a very timely matter with no flaws. Looked at very similar stockings on other websites that were twice the cost. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SavvyKyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I like this brand of stocking, but these designs are not my favorite. A little dull.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia F.

customer_reviews.title: These stockings look nice and seem to be made of good quality
customer_reviews.text: These stockings look nice and seem to be made of good quality. They don't stretch much and the opening is rather small so it is a little tricky to stuff these stockings. Also, since they are made of yarn, some items may get caught on the inside of the stocking.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Moring

customer_reviews.title: Only received one stocking
customer_reviews.text: I only received one stocking! Also disappointed in the color is much less rich than the photos
customer_reviews.author: Stephylu

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre quality, dislike the colors
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting these to be decent quality, but found the stitching to be really uneven and I wasn't sure these would last more than a few holidays. Also I would prefer a deeper red. I returned these stockings and waited for the Pottery Barn stockings to go on sale. Got awesome velvet, embroidered stockings for $15 each.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Xmas stockings
customer_reviews.text: It's just the two of us empty nesters now, so I upgraded us to "adult" Christmas stockings this year. These stockings are beautifully made and hold a good amount of small gifts, candies, etc. Festive colors that add to the holiday decor.
customer_reviews.author: LindyLouTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Previous Reviews Made the Difference on My Order
customer_reviews.text: Thank you all for your comments about this product! I ended up ordering the two stockings, and they are great! Ready for next year! The size/length is larger/longer than highlighted on the description...but previous reviewers commented about this, so I was not surprised, and one reason I went ahead and ordered! The colors are subdued more than on the picture...again, something previously written about, and what I considered as I ordered. They complement each other...and since there are only two in our family, will work nicely by our fireplace...and with the other holiday decorations I have!
customer_reviews.author: MMG

customer_reviews.title: Really big and look great
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are really well sized and look great. Plus at 2 for $10 for nice, quality, and large stockings is great. Can't wait to use them this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: this is a great look/quality item
customer_reviews.text: Externally, this is a great look/quality item. Inside, as others have mentioned, there are lots of small threads that items ended up getting caught up in. They hold quite a bit, once you get past that. Would recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: ) very well made and good quality stocking
customer_reviews.text: The photo used shows two different patterns. Our shipment arrived with two of the same pattern. We didn't mind them matching, but in case your looking to mix and match you may want to message seller first just to be safe! :) very well made and good quality stocking! Can't wait to put them up good use!
customer_reviews.author: PSU :)

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Rip off!!
customer_reviews.text: Only received one, when it as listed as two. I should have read reviews beforehand as it appears this has happened to others. The quality of the stocking is also not very good. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: great traditional stockings
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome for the price. I got two of the same design. I was hoping for different ones like the picture shows, but I'll get over it. They are very good quality. Opening at top is 5 1/2" across on the inside, but will stretch a little. I love the old fashioned look.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another set of stockings that were too small prior to these. These stocking were the perfect size and seem durable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely knit stockings!
customer_reviews.text: The pic does not do these justice. They are beautiful and of excellent quality. I bought 2 pairs of these and each pair was one of each pattern. I will post a pic soon.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Y

customer_reviews.title: I really like these stockings
customer_reviews.text: I really like these stockings...I only use them for decoration as the material will stretch if filled. I also stuff them with packing/gift paper to help fill them out.
customer_reviews.author: SNBRN

customer_reviews.title: Look really odd stuffed.
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice. I bought them for my husband and I and I absolutely love them. They don't hold their shape at all when stuffed but that is only one night and then they are emptied again, looking fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: NicoldShoulder

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful, well made
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful, well made. Able to hold all the goodies I stuffed in there. A perfect addition to my seasons decor.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: You'll shoot your eye out kid!
customer_reviews.text: Love these stockings, my wife and I bought them for our first christmas together. They're a little small but they're great quality and have vintage old times christmas nostalgia that you can't beat!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Paul

customer_reviews.title: Xmas stocking
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money! They look nice and they will last
customer_reviews.author: Chick

customer_reviews.title: These stockings are adorable. I ordered them for a more "classic" Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are adorable. I ordered them for a more "classic" Christmas look, and I was pleasantly surprised. They are actually longer than they look in their photo and hold as much as any standard stocking you could buy in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Christmas stockings
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Christmas stockings. We’re big enough for all the stocking stuffers. Arrived when they said they would. I would order them again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with the quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the quality for the price, but I mostly bought these because they were so complimentary to some Moroccan pillows I have while still feeling like Christmas. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Carroll Schwab

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE!!!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these is amazing!! I would expect to pay around $30 a piece for these in boutiques! The colors are rich and vibrant, and the stockings are thick and well made. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: rachelkhays

customer_reviews.title: They look awesome, a bit hard to actually stuff with goodies ...
customer_reviews.text: They look awesome, a bit hard to actually stuff with goodies though if you are actually using them. They need some kind of interior liner so goodies don't get snagged all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive Stocking With Room for Many Small Gifts!
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and nicely made, with lots of room for small gifts -- shower gel, Chakra stones, scented candles, gloves/mittens, toiletries and small boxes of candy fit into mine.
customer_reviews.author: Charleigh

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Stockings
customer_reviews.text: Perfect stockings for my 2 dogs. Just keep in mind they are knit so when filled they do not hold their shape.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Received two identical stockings
customer_reviews.text: The stockings are well made and large for stuffing, but I was expecting two different stockings as the pictures shows. I received two of the striped stockings.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this set because we like the first ones so well, wanted more
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Williamson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE STOCKINGS!
customer_reviews.text: These beautiful stockings were the perfect addition to our fireplace this year! The vibrant red and green were so festive! Great quality for such a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: KWW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stockings! Full knit with a tight stich. I just bought another. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Janet knorp

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: The quality looks great and they arrived just one day after ordering them! These stockings are nice and thick. They feel like they'd be very expensive. I'm stoked on these stockings!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Stockings
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful stockings! You can fit a lot in the stocking. It doesn't have much elasticity in the top part though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, ironed on my son's 1st Christmas tee and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: melee

customer_reviews.title: My order was wrong
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product which was suppose to come as a set of 2 and I only revived 1 stocking.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality and length. Fun classic stocking look. Plenty of space on cuff to embroider names. Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Denise L.

customer_reviews.title: pretty but delicate
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel. I bought 4 but inside is very delicate and the yarn snagged when stuffed.
customer_reviews.author: Pido

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this!! Came in on time and is exactly like the picture!!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are nice:) super thick, well made, think they'll be used for years to come .
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and look homemade. I was totally impressed with the look and the quality
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: You will be very pleased about how nice they look hanging. I am pleased that they held there shape after stuffing with gifts. Wonderful buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and of good quality but too skinny to fit much of anything.
customer_reviews.author: Sung Whang

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy to hang them by the fireplace
customer_reviews.text: The stockings were even nicer than I had hoped. I was so happy to hang them by the fireplace,
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, well made. 2 designs. Totally worth the price. I used one as a "gift bag" for a large wine bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Stallard

customer_reviews.title: I loved these stockings
customer_reviews.text: I loved these stockings, a great value for the price but thought I was getting one of each as the picture shows. I ordered 3 pairs so I have four of one kind and two of the other which doesn't really work with my grandchildren. Otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and gets dismantled easily at the side seam. The quality is really poor.
customer_reviews.author: Arev G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit Christmas Stockings for 2
customer_reviews.text: Love these! As many reviews stated they are larger than they seem in the photo which is great. They are a perfect size for what we need and look like they will last for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: BCommunity

customer_reviews.title: The price is great for the pair and I even placed another order ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and festive! They are exactly as pictured and detailed. The price is great for the pair and I even placed another order after receiving the first two.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great Stockings!!!
customer_reviews.text: The stockings are just what I wanted. They are quality, heavy duty and each have loops to hang on my mantle. Beautiful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: They are ok, not as thick or well knitted as I wanted
customer_reviews.author: IJA

customer_reviews.title: Classic Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: The image makes these look smaller then they are. They are a nice length.. Christmas perfect. Heavy weight, they will enjoy many -many Christmases.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Amberg

customer_reviews.title: They are nice stockings but they came as two of the same ...
customer_reviews.text: They are nice stockings but they came as two of the same stockings rather than two different ones like in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Storm Halbich

customer_reviews.title: Good extra stocking for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Had my nephew and his girlfriend visiting for Christmas and wanted to make sure they had stocking for the holidays. Stockings held lots of goodies and were even nicer than the picture. Excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: ex-pat K

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but I received 2 of the same stocking instead of 2 different patterns
customer_reviews.author: Angela Masciarelli

customer_reviews.title: Small openings but well made
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and the size but it's true what the other reviews say - the top CANNOT be stretched. I'm sure it's to maintain the shape but it really limits what you can put in the stockings. It's a smaller opening than other stockings as well. It's our first Christmas on a budget so this was still a great deal and will make for sweet decorations but my search for "our stockings" continues. These are well made and well worth the cost however.
customer_reviews.author: AleXandra

customer_reviews.title: They really should take a better photo of these
customer_reviews.text: They really should take a better photo of these. They are SO CUTE! They're actually like a rustic green and red. And the price....AWESOME! You really cannot beat the price and they have exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Tooth Fairy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These are Amazing for the price! Got 2 stockings for less than the cost of one in stores and they look incredible! They are well made. They aren't very stretchy like most knitted stockings but they fit a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Issa

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I loved the price of these stockings. They’re the large, normal size stockings, and hold quite a bit of stuff! My only qualm is that there isn’t a lining, and things can get caught on the loose strings inside. Overall, I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: They are heavy duty and GREAT size but I wish that They both had different design/color but will be good to put names on them. Summarized: mine were the same but still good exactly what I was looking for. Hopefully this helped you and happy holidays! 🎁
customer_reviews.author: krista bonhotel

customer_reviews.title: Cute, festive and functional
customer_reviews.text: Such a hit with the kids! Stuffing wasn't a problem. I was a little concerned about ordering these because I've purchased stockings made out of yarn and it made stuffing the stockings difficult. This was not the case with these. Everything went in without catching on anything and the size fit more than the typical stocking. FANTASTIC!!!! If you are looking for something cute, festive, and functional, BUY THESE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Reviewed by Me

customer_reviews.title: looks pretty, but
customer_reviews.text: these don't stretch horizontally, so you can't get anything too wide in them and overall has a low capacity (I like to put a lot of items in and these couldn't handle the task)
customer_reviews.author: zhafahzha

customer_reviews.title: YAS
customer_reviews.text: One is slightly longer than the other but tbh I don’t care bc these were CHEAP and look freakin GREAT. Whole apartment looks more Christmassy with these hanging over the fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than I expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I expected for the price. The inside is not lined so can snag, but i didn't have that problem. I ordered two pairs; each pair contained one of each design, contrary to what some other reviewers said they received. These were a little bigger than i expected and fit more than i thought they would. They are keepers! Super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: These look exactly as pictured and are super cute! I bought them for my boyfriend and I for our first apartment together last year, and have them hung up again this year! They are pretty big so can fit a lot inside, and stretch really well. The colors are also really rich and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive correct product
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t receive the correct product. I received a cream and green version, not the red version that was clearly shown and described on the listing. If I wanted the green version then I would have purchased that option. Super annoying.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Well made and easy to personalize
customer_reviews.text: Great stockings. I bought a set to add to our other stockings for my mother and daughters boyfriend. They are well made and I was able to sew names into them easily. I would definately buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Harriett Krein

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice - I love the thickness and durability of these - you did a fine job.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Dye

customer_reviews.title: "Starched" Stockings
customer_reviews.text: I thought that these stockings would be a lot more flexible, but they are very rigid. Don't expect to fit anything more in there than what you see in the image. Otherwise, they're cute.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I received the exact two stockings shown in the photo. I am very pleased with these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets. One of each stocking had a hole in it. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Shoe addict

customer_reviews.title: very nice, just not exactly what the pic shows
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are so nice in person! I read all the reviews so I wasnt shocked when I bought 3 sets and they didn't come with one of each pattern like the picture shows. I got 2 sets (4 total) of the left pattern and 1 set of the right pattern. I still think they were worth it! My husband and I will take the two that Match and the kids can have the 4 others that match.
customer_reviews.author: mama s

customer_reviews.title: I like them, but just be advised....
customer_reviews.text: These are cute stockings. However, be aware that these are not lined, so things you put in the stocking can potential snag on the inside yarns / or be difficult to slip inside. I wrapped all my gifts first, so I had no problem getting them in.
customer_reviews.author: gloria

customer_reviews.title: Great Decor
customer_reviews.text: I'm not in love with these. They don't stretch as much as I wold like. I'm very picky when it comes to Christmas Stockings and I should have known better than to buy them online. They look super cute when there's nothing inside though so great for decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER cute! Great quality. Thick! Just what I wanted. Very quant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: well made stockings
customer_reviews.text: Very cute; retro looking stocking set. I received the pair just as pictured (one of each pattern).
customer_reviews.author: Happy Chappy

customer_reviews.title: These are great size and quality
customer_reviews.text: My old Christmas stockings were ruined while stored and I needed new ones quickly. These are great size and quality. Look great on the fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Farmer Grandma

customer_reviews.title: just what I was looking for! !!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, item description was spot on! They look great hanging. So glad I ordered 6. Only 2 patterns, but I am ok with that.
customer_reviews.author: E. Stine

customer_reviews.title: Too big!
customer_reviews.text: Although the quality is nice the size of the stocking size is utterly ridiculous! It is so big it simply doesn't fit hanging on a very large fireplace!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: These stockings are great! They are excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These stockings are great! They are excellent quality! I got 2 for $11 so for less than $6 a piece I couldn't believe how nice these are. They are a great size and shape and look great on our mantle. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not quite what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These were cute but not what I was looking for so I ended up returning them. The stockings were smaller than I was looking for and had no give or stretch which made it difficult to put items inside of it.
customer_reviews.author: Seal

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture!
customer_reviews.text: I got two stocking, just like the photo. Super cute! High quality for the price! Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: PossessedByShoppingDemons

customer_reviews.title: Big enough to add a few fun goodies but not get carried away and break the ...
customer_reviews.text: So darn (darn haha) cute. Big enough to add a few fun goodies but not get carried away and break the bank. Happy addition to this family's Christmas decor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are better as decoration than as a kids' stocking
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely, but all of the things I put in them got snagged on the yarn inside the stocking. They are better as decoration than as a kids' stocking.
customer_reviews.author: amanda johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These remind me of some old stockings my mom had that my great aunt knitted. I received both styles (unlike some). They look beautiful. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Look Homemade!
customer_reviews.text: I love these stockings. Well made and hold many items when filled. The guallity is amazing for the price. Very pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: John Proffitt

customer_reviews.title: These Are Adorable
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as advertised. They remind me of the stockings I had when I was younger. I got one of each design, not two of the same as some people have said.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Totally Awesome! Can't wait to fill them at Christmas! Great quality! A super purchase! Thinking of buying more and filling them with treats for the little ones that drop in during the holidays!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, festive!
customer_reviews.text: Love the festive design and the quality of these stockings. So Christmasy! I use these only for decor and not to actually put gifts in so I can't vouch for how much weight it can take...
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

product_meta.title: Kurt Adler B0658 Heavy Yarn Stocking, Set of 2, Red/Green
product_meta.description:
These Heavy Yarn Stockings from Kurt Adler are perfect for hanging by the chimney with care! 
Kurt Adler specializes in beautifully detailed Christmas Ornaments and holiday seasonal decor designed exclusively with your needs in mind!
Create beautiful holiday memories to treasures for generations to come! Makes the perfect Gift for family and friends

Product Features:
